synopsis.text: Ayatsugi High School's Takeshi Chimatsuri, son of a legendary samurai, dreams of following in his father's footsteps. However, his journey takes an unexpected turn when the Toki twins, descendants of a vanquished ninja, enroll in his school. Seeking vengeance for their grandfather's defeat and the return of a precious family heirloom, the twins exploit Takeshi's unique vulnerability: an intense fear of naked women. To overcome this challenge, Takeshi embarks on a peculiar training regimen with the help of his teacher Miss Ayatsugi and friends Atsuko and Tora, aiming to conquer his phobia and prove his mettle as a true samurai.
